articles.title: Greece is battling Europe's "largest wildfire ever recorded," and it's "still out of control" - CBS News
articles.description: The EU is deploying almost half its firefighting air wing as an "out of control" blaze tears along a nearly 6-mile line through a Greek national park.
articles.content: Greece is battling "the largest wildfire ever recorded" in the European Union, prompting the bloc to mobilize almost half of its firefighting air wing to help tackle it, a European Commission spokesm… [+3151 chars]
